H0.text: According to the Gospel of St. John, what 'lay on the other side of the Brook of Hedron'. Olive Grove

H1.text: According to the Gospel of St. John, what 'lay on the other side of the Brook of Hedron'. Tomb of Absalom

H2.text: According to the Gospel of St. John, what 'lay on the other side of the Brook of Hedron'. Mount of Olives

H3.text: According to the Gospel of St. John, what 'lay on the other side of the Brook of Hedron'. GARDEN OF GETHSEMENE

A4.text: John states he went to a garden near the Kidron Valley

A5.text: Mark and Matthew record that Jesus went to 'a place called the oil press (Gethsemane)' and John states he went to a garden near the Kidron Valley
